execution_plan.description: Find categories where more than half of the products in the category are inactive; return category id, name, inactive product count and total product count.
execution_plan.query: SELECT c.id, c.name, COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE p.is_active = false) AS inactive_count, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM categories c JOIN products p ON p.category_id = c.id GROUP BY c.id, c.name HAVING COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE p.is_active = false) > COUNT(*) / 2;
